vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: pragma solidity ^0.4.23;
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in IToken.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (IToken.sol#3): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function balanceOf(address) external view returns (uint);
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '' of IToken.balanceOf (IToken.sol#10) is not in mixedCase
